titleStmt.title: To the right worshipfull the heads of the respective colleges and halls in the University of Oxford you are desired to signify to your societies that on Thursday April 23 the day of His Majesties coronation there will be a sermon at St. Maries at ten of the clock in the morning ...
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.
